snippet.title: Devil Spire Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Devil Spire is a hardcore first-person pseudo-3D roguelite action RPG stylized after retro PC games.

Created by me, Ithiro Sumi (Twitter @1r0), with the help of my friends Lucas Bressan and Lucas Perdomo.

Play the free DEMO and wishlist it at:
https://ithiro.itch.io/devil-spire
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1861290/Devil_Spire

Join our Discord community:
https://discord.gg/Hd2tESGqyE

We also have a wiki at:
https://devil-spire.fandom.com

Music:
Truth of the Legend by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4551-truth-of-the-legend
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
